conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway/isometric view with extruded walls, visible thickness, and interior volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and readable room volumes; clean cutaway with minor simplification at some wall tops/edges.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall footprint and primary adjacency (living/dining to balcony, bedroom to right, wet areas upper-right) largely match; however utility/toilet separation appears altered/merged and some partition lengths/opening placements are approximated.

interior_elements.notes: Sofa/coffee table/dining set, bed, kitchen counters/sink, and bathroom fixtures/washer are present and generally placed in the correct zones with reasonable scale.

visual_clarity.notes: Good readability of walls/floors/openings with consistent materials and no UI/text contamination; lighting is sufficient to see interior geometry.

detected_errors.description: Utility and Toilet-1 areas do not appear as distinctly separated rooms as in the 2D plan (upper-right wet zone seems reconfigured/combined).
Some door/window opening sizes/positions are approximated compared to the 2D plan (not all openings are clearly verifiable in the 3D view).

summary: True 3D cutaway conversion with strong overall layout fidelity, but with a notable reconfiguration of the utility/toilet partitioning and minor opening-placement approximations.
